name: Income-Qualified Pre-Owned Electric Vehicle Rebate
description: Up to $3,500 for pre-owned EV ($1,500 for fully electric, $1,000 for plug-in hybrid); LIHEAP-eligible customers may get $1,000 bonus; vehicles with MPGe 117+ may get additional $1,000 bonus
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers substantial rebates for income-qualified Santa Clara residents purchasing pre-owned electric vehicles, with bonuses for efficiency and LIHEAP eligibility.
whatTheyOffer:
- $1,500 rebate for fully electric vehicles
- $1,000 rebate for plug-in hybrids
- Additional $1,000 bonus for LIHEAP-eligible
- Additional $1,000 for vehicles with MPGe 117+
- Up to $3,500 total possible
- Pre-owned vehicles qualify
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Meet income eligibility requirements
3. Purchase qualifying pre-owned EV
4. Apply online after purchase
5. Submit proof of purchase and income
6. LIHEAP customers submit additional documentation
